contactId.title: contactId
contactId.description: The contactId of the current messaging user. If this is blank, a new contact record will be created. The new or updated Contact Record, use this for context in other actions.

contactRecord.title: contactRecord
contactRecord.description: The new or updated Contact Record, use this for context in other actions.

errorMessage.title: errorMessage
errorMessage.description: If there were any errors or system messages. Follow the message details and further instructions. You can show the customer general details if appropriate.

newAccountInvitationUrl.title: newAccountInvitationUrl
newAccountInvitationUrl.description: Users can finish creating their new account and set their password using this url. It will also be sent to their email address.
